metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6631 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in GPAC version 0.8.0. There is a NULL pointer dereference in the function gf_m2ts_stream_process_pmt() in media_tools/m2ts_mux.c.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
